name: Wasp Digging Hive Builder
description:
This game is about building a hive as a Queen wasp. You must collect materials, to create eggs. Eggs must be built on honeycomb. To make Honey Comb, you have to select it in your inventory. Honey Comb must be in the ground. You must nurture your eggs by clicking them. Once the eggs hatch, the bees can do material collecting and egg nurturing themselves.

Controls:

W A S D- movement

RightClick- Destroy Tiles

LeftClick- Place Down, Nuture.

E- Action

1,2,3 Switch Item

Change Log

  1. Fixed performance issues
  2. Fixed issue when Wasp nutures egg
  3. Fixed graphical issue, when Wasp would move to the right.
  4. Fixed physics on egg.
